Articles.Content:
I looked at the rules and I can't find anything that doesn't saying I can't post this. But of course sorry if I'm wrong. 

My family is work on make a Agricultural Dryer. It is designed to dry crops in a way that doesn't damage the crop itself, because it does not really heat the crop, it is much cheaper to run and use. 

I'm just trying to help get the word out there. But here is the gofundme link:

[url=][http://www.gofundme.com/w7fnh9k](https://www.gofundme.com/w7fnh9k)

Seeker
